tool_description: Shorten a long url to tiny link
name: Noly url shortener
title: Noly url shortener

api_list.name: Shorten long link
api_list.description:
Use this endpoint to shorten a URL. The response will be a JSON object with the following structure:

On success:
{
"status": 1,
"error": "",
"data": "https://tombo.icu/57h80n"
}

On failure:
{
"status": 0,
"error": "This website is already shortened here.",
"data": "https://tombo.icu/57h80n"
}

The "data" field contains the shortened URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://noly-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/shorten/www.google.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noly-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://noly-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/shorten/{link}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noly-url-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
